title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: The Pragmatic Play's new Drops and Wins network tournament is a thrilling event that Betplay.io cordially welcomes you to participate in. A prize fund worth EUR/USD 124,000 will be granted to the winners of this network event. This series consists of two weekly tournaments, the fun never stops!The fun-filled event will take place from October 5th to October 19th, 2022.Tournament Schedule:Week 1: 5 October 2022, 7:01 p.m. CET to 12 October 2022. 6:59 p.m. CETWeek 2: 12 October 2022, 7:01 p.m. CET to 19 October 2022. 6:59 p.m. CETThe minimum bet for the two weekly tournaments is 0.50 EUR/USD. The exciting tourney is also accessible in the currencies such as TRY, TND, TZS, and RUB.To join, the player just needs to play the participating games which are Wolf Gold, Mustang Gold, Sweet Bonanza, John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen, Great Rhino Megaways, John Hunter and the Book of Tut, The Dog House, The Dog House Megaways, Chilli Heat, Fruit Party, Big Bass Bonanza, Madame Destiny Megaways, Gems Bonanza, Wild Wild Riches, Wild West Gold, Gates of Olympus, Power of Thor Megaways, Floating Dragon Hold&Spin, The Hand of Midas, Buffalo King Megaways, Juicy Fruits, Bigger Bass Bonanza, Starlight Princess, Jokerâ€™s Jewels, Big Bass Bonanza Megaways, Book of The Fallen, 5 Lions Megaways, Buffalo King, Extra Juicy Megaways, Hot Fiesta, Cleocatra, Wild West Gold Megaways, Big Bass Splash, Sugar Rush, Cosmic Cash, Gorilla Mayhem, Greedy Wolf, Hot to Burn Extreme, Down the rails, Fire Hot 5, Fire Hot 20, Fire Hot 40, Fire Hot 100, October Fortunes, Happy Hooves.Huge rewards are falling from the sky! Experience some of the thrills. If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service https://betplay.io/en/news/drops-and-wins-slots-tournament!.
